usefulItems: square cake tin (20 cm), baking paper, baking tray, oven
title: Apple Pie Bars

ingredients.content: 400 g Granny Smith apples, peeled, cored and quartered before weighing

preparations.content: Preheat oven to 190°C and place a flat baking tray in oven. Line base and sides of a square cake tin (20 cm) with baking paper.
Place plain flour and sugar into mixing bowl and mix <b>20 sec/speed 10<b>.
Add butter and egg yolk, and mix <b>8 sec/speed 6<b>.
Transfer pastry to prepared cake tin then press down to form a smooth surface.

Place apples into mixing bowl and chop <b>5 sec/speed 4<b> then spread evenly over pastry base. Put cake tin on top of mixing bowl lid and weigh condensed milk into it by pouring directly over the apples.
